Text.Page:
We have to destroy the argons guarding this labyrinth.

They have sturdier armor than we usually see on argons, so retrieve some of their armor plating for our smiths to research.

Hah! You peeled their hides right off!

Quite bold, .

Well done, my comrade.

The argons have discovered a new way to make armor.

Bring me some of it for our smiths to learn from.
